text:
Song Meili (born 23 February 1995) is a Chinese female volleyball player. She was part of the China women's national volleyball team. She participated in the 2013 FIVB Volleyball Women's U20 World Championship, 2015 Montreux Volley Masters, 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U23 World Championship, 2015 Asian Women's U23 Volleyball Championship, 2016 Asian Women's Volleyball Cup, and 2017 FIVB Volleyball Women's U23 World Championship.
She played for Shandong women's volleyball team.
